guardian.title: Canadian man and American woman charged over foiled mass shooting plot
guardian.topComment: I am utterly sick of hearing about thick arseholes with guns.

guardian.title: Record New York City murder freeze hits 12 days as experts cite extreme cold
guardian.topComment: It is just too dang cold to murderate anyone.

guardian.title: Netanyahu trip to Congress provokes harsh reaction from US Jewish leaders
guardian.topComment: If Bibi comes to the U.S., he should be immediately arrested for war crimes. (The attempted genocide in Gaza and the egging on of "settlers" in their theft of Palestinian lands would be good places to start prosecution.)
